title: [Large-Scale] Online Collaboration-Based Language Simulation Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Based on a collaboration model between universities and private educational institutions, it aims to improve practical language skills in a VR environment. Personalized content and formative assessments provide continuous feedback.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in situational conversation skills across at least three specialized fields (e.g., hospitals, hotels) using VR simulations.
Learners improve language expression accuracy by 15% over two weeks through weekly formative assessments.
Learners complete 100% of peer evaluations and feedback on the online collaborative learning platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
